overview:
We are Ramses Tours; one of the fastest growing tour agencies in the Egyptian market Although we are newborn agency, we were able to achieve unlimited successes in short time with our professional policy which enables us to meet our customers’ expectations. With our well-experienced youth team, we became highly recommended on various global websites like tripadvisor.com, cruisecritic.com, travel.yahoo.com, sharetrip.com… etc We can offer various services which include, prepare multi-options tours, rent cars, book hotels and support you with Egyptologist guides and so other services… We promise you with very unique experience, sweet memories and unforgettable times… Ramses Tours… It Is All About You

Contact Us: Website: www.ramsestours.com Mail: info@ramsestours.com Mob: 00 2 010 680 88 57 00 2 010 214 29 48 Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/#!/Egypttraveltours
